statements: SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_list FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level > 2;
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_steps FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_list, nutrition_info FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_list FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC
SELECT recipe_name, preparation_steps FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level > 2
SELECT DISTINCT difficulty_level FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, nutrition_info FROM recipes WHERE nutrition_info LIKE '%high%';
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nutrition_tips ORDER BY tip_title DESC;
SELECT tip_id, tip_title FROM nutrition_tips WHERE tip_title LIKE '%healthy%';
SELECT id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Chicken%';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE instructions LIKE '%grill%' ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT id, recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE ingredients IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nutrition_tips WHERE tip_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tutorial;
SELECT title, description FROM tutorial WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM tutorial WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title, rating FROM tutorial JOIN user_ratings ON tutorial.id = user_ratings.tutorial_id WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT title, tip_description FROM nutrition_tip WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tutorial WHERE id = 1;
SELECT description, title FROM tutorial WHERE title LIKE '%Beginner%';
SELECT title, video_url FROM tutorial WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, title, description, video_url FROM tutorial WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT t.title, t.description, n.tip_description FROM tutorial t INNER JOIN nutrition_tip n ON t.id = n.id;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, category_id FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3 AND category_id = 2;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1 OR recipe_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM recipe;
SELECT recipe_title, ingredients FROM recipe WHERE id = 1;
SELECT tutorial_title, steps FROM tutorial ORDER BY tutorial_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_title, calories, protein FROM recipe JOIN nutrition ON recipe.id = nutrition.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_title, ingredients FROM recipe LIMIT 5;
SELECT tutorial_id, tutorial_title FROM tutorial WHERE tutorial_id < 5;

SELECT user.username, recipe.recipe_title, nutrition.calories FROM user JOIN favorites ON user.user_id = favorites.user_id JOIN recipe ON favorites.recipe_id = recipe.id JOIN nutrition ON recipe.id = nutrition.recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM tutorial WHERE LENGTH(steps) > 500;
SELECT user.username AS author, recipe.recipe_title AS dish, nutrition.calories AS kcal FROM user, recipe, nutrition WHERE user.user_id = 1 AND recipe.id = nutrition.recipe_id;
